title: Life Goes On (Trae album)
text:
Life Goes On is the fourth studio album by American <a href="Rapping">rapper</a> <a href="Trae%20tha%20Truth">Trae</a>. It was released on October 23, 2007 via G-Maab Entertainment, <a href="Rap-A-Lot%20Records">Rap-A-Lot Records</a>, <a href="Asylum%20Records">Asylum Records</a> and <a href="Atlantic%20Records">Atlantic Records</a>. The album features <a href="guest%20appearance">guest appearance</a>s from <a href="Jody%20Breeze">Jody Breeze</a>, <a href="Jadakiss">Jadakiss</a>, <a href="Slim%20Thug">Slim Thug</a>, <a href="Styles%20P">Styles P</a> and <a href="Yung%20Joc">Yung Joc</a> among others. The album was supported by lead <a href="Single%20%28music%29">single</a>: "Screwed Up" featuring <a href="Lil%27%20Wayne">Lil' Wayne</a>.
The S.L.A.B.-ED version of the album was released on December 8, 2007. DJ Pollie Pop created this version of the album through his account on <a href="Myspace">Myspace</a>. To date, the album has sold 12,500 copies in its first week.
